analyses.title: Sales Performance Analysis
analyses.context: Analyzing the overall sales performance across different branches, cities, and product lines.

sub_analyses.title: Total Sales by Branch
sub_analyses.why: Determine which branches are generating the most revenue.
answers: Total sales amount for each branch.

sub_analyses.title: Total Sales by City
answers: Total sales amount for each city.

sub_analyses.title: Top Performing Product Lines by Sales
sub_analyses.why: Identify the most successful product lines in terms of revenue.
answers: Total sales amount for each product line.

analyses.title: Customer Demographics Analysis
analyses.context: Examining customer characteristics such as type and gender to understand differences in purchasing behavior.

sub_analyses.title: Customer Type Purchase Comparison
sub_analyses.why: Assess the purchasing differences between Member and Normal customers.
answers: Sales and quantity metrics for each customer type.

sub_analyses.title: Gender-based Sales Analysis
sub_analyses.why: Explore sales patterns across different genders.

analyses.title: Payment Method Analysis
analyses.context: Understanding preferences in payment methods among customers.

sub_analyses.title: Preferred Payment Methods
sub_analyses.why: Identify the most commonly used payment methods.
answers: Count of transactions by each payment method.

sub_analyses.title: Sales by Payment Method
sub_analyses.why: Analyze which payment methods are linked to higher sales.
answers: Total sales by each payment method.

analyses.title: Product Line and Financial Performance
analyses.context: Analyzing product line performance in connection with financial metrics.

sub_analyses.title: Average Unit Price by Product Line
sub_analyses.why: Understand pricing differences among product lines.
answers: Average unit price for each product line.

sub_analyses.title: Gross Income by Product Line
sub_analyses.why: Determine which product lines are the most profitable.
answers: Total gross income from each product line.

sub_analyses.title: Daily Sales Trends
sub_analyses.why: Identify sales patterns and peaks on different days.

sub_analyses.title: Peak Transaction Times
sub_analyses.why: Determine the times of day with the highest transaction volumes.
answers: Volume of transactions per time of day.

analyses.title: Customer Satisfaction Analysis
analyses.context: Examining customer ratings to assess satisfaction levels.

sub_analyses.title: Average Rating by Branch
sub_analyses.why: Understand customer satisfaction levels at different locations.
answers: Average customer rating for each branch.

sub_analyses.title: Rating Distribution
sub_analyses.why: Analyze the spread of customer ratings to assess overall satisfaction.
answers: Distribution of customer ratings across all transactions.
